channel.title: Demos on Fluid Player Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Demos on Fluid Player Documentation

item.title: Demo
item.description: Default Layout Supports VAST (Video Ad Serving Template). Comes with its own design, which is easily customizable. Timeline Preview. Lightweight. Compatible with modern web browsers. Custom Themed Layout Easily customised with our primaryColor configuration. Multiple VAST and NonLinear Ad Ability to have more than 1 VAST (example: pre-roll and mid-roll). Ability to show non Linear (Banner) ads. Autoplay with Mute enabled Video playing when user lands Sound muted by default Download Allow the video to be downloaded easily by setting allowDownload to true Playback Rate Adjustable video speed Easily set by enabling playbackRateEnabled
